message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product at a price of $13,000. I believe it presents significant value at this price point, considering its potential benefits to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,000 is a tempting offer, the true value of this product is considerably higher. I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This is my final offer.
I'm still not convinced that $11,500 is the best price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $10,500. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
